name: Better Email
author: IGNITE®

sections.description:
Better email by Ignite Online lets you deliver your emails reliably via AWS Ses or debug them quickly without sending spam to your clients on Mailtrap.
The plugin reads your website environment or the WP_DEBUG mode to understand where to send your emails.
This plugins requires an account on both Mailtrap and AWS to work correctly.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ignite-better-email folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘Ignite’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with Ignite Better Email? Get in touch with us

  1. Support

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the entire ignite-better-email folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘Ignite’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.

short_description: Deliver and debug your emails reliably.
